CustomField.description: This email address does NOT sync into Autopilot automatically - this Organisation Account must have a Primary Contact linked by an Affiliation record in order to be sent emails via that Contact, using Autopilot
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This email address does NOT sync into Autopilot automatically - this Organisation Account must have a Primary Contact linked by an Affiliation record in order to be sent emails via that Contact, using Autopilot
CustomField.label: Email
